name: Final 5
storyline: You play as Rookie, a fresh-faced recruit who finds herself at the end of the world with the mysterious Dr. Mikami. The Doctor gives Rookie a wristwatch that can rewind time – but only for 5 minutes. Rookie must defeat the horde and eventually find her way out of this time loop, along with the rest of the survivors.
summary: Final 5 is a fast-paced mobile RPG action shooter. Dodge, shoot and upgrade to survive in a post-apocalyptic world. Gather skills that match your playstyle to advance through the horde!
